thread.title: Simon Barnes

author: Simon Barnes
title: Simon Barnes
text: I've used 365games.co.uk a number of times now and I've always had great service. Being a board game fiend, I'm always on the lookout for a great price for both the game and the delivery - to which 365games always seems to win my attention with. I'm a bit of a cheapskate when it comes to delivery as I'm happy waiting a few extra days for something rather than next day to save a few bob, however 365games always seems to ship them out super quickly even on the most basic delivery option!
